item.description:
Hi Everyone,

This movie was one of the ones we were interested in for the drive-in event so this is a substiute meetup for that cancellation.

IThe movie starts at 6:30 pm, and I'm planning on arriving at a self-serve restaurant with good food on the corner of Church and Brattle streets just down the street from the theatre.  I don't remember the name of it.  As stated above, I'll plan to arrive there about 5:30 with my Meetup sign.  Hope you can join me whenever you can get there.  This will be a casual get-together like the drive-in would have been.  Looking forward to seeing you there.

Susan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll meet people at Market in the Square, 60 Church Street, corner of Brattle Street @ 5:15 with my Meetup sign on the table
item.name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
